name: conventional-comments-shields-extension
description: Browser extension for adding conventional comment shields to GitHub PR reviews

scripts.dev: tsc && node build.js && echo 'Extension built. Load the dist/ folder in chrome://extensions/ for development'
scripts.package: tsc && node build.js && echo 'Extension packaged in dist/ directory'
scripts.watch:full: tsc && node build.js && echo 'Watching for changes...' && nodemon --watch . --ext ts,js,json,html,css --exec 'tsc && node build.js'

author: Virgil ROGER <roger.virgil@gmail.com>
